Components of that ETF showing particular strength include shares of Brookfield Asset Management (BAM.A.CA), up about 2.4% and shares of Riocan Real Estate Investment Trust (REI.UN.CA), up about 1.7% on the day.
Among components of that ETF with the weakest showing on Friday were shares of Agenus (AGEN), lower by about 12.2%, and shares of Heron Therapeutics (HRTX), lower by about 10.6% on the day.
In trading on Friday, the SPDR Dow Jones International Real Estate ETF (RWX) is outperforming other ETFs, up about 2.1% on the day.
And underperforming other ETFs today is the SPDR S&P Biotech ETF (XBI), off about 3.7% in Friday afternoon trading.
